video.title: Trailer Park Boys
video.synopsis: Follow the booze-fueled misadventures of three longtime pals and petty serial criminals who run scams from their Nova Scotia trailer park.

episodes.synopsis: After an 18-month jail sentence, Ricky and Julian head home to get their lives back together but a bully has taken control of the park.
episodes.title: Take Your Little Gun and Get Out of My Trailer Park

episodes.synopsis: Julian decides to depart Sunnyvale Trailer Park and go to community college to finally do something productive in his life.
episodes.title: F**k Community College, Let's Get Drunk and Eat Chicken Fingers

episodes.synopsis: Ricky and Bubbles agree to star in J-Roc's porno film but Ricky loses his nerve, forcing Bubbles to stand in for him on a particularly steamy scene.
episodes.title: Mr. Lahey's Got My Porno Tape!

episodes.synopsis: Ricky lets a dog devour a tray of hash brownies and takes the dog to the local veterinarian. He must then run errands for the vet to pay for it.
episodes.title: Mrs. Peterson's Dog Gets F**ked Up

episodes.synopsis: Julian convinces Ricky that it's time to marry Lucy. Reluctant at first, Ricky changes his mind when Julian suggests that people will assume he's gay.
episodes.title: I'm Not Gay, I Love Lucy... Wait a Second, Maybe I Am Gay

episodes.synopsis: Lucy asks Julian to plan the wedding since she thinks Ricky is not up to it, but his plans ruin the wedding when the cops show up.
episodes.title: Who the Hell Invited These Idiots to My Wedding?

episodes.synopsis: After nearly six months in jail, Ricky and Julian come back to find the trailer park a disaster. They reveal to Bubbles their plan to start a grow op.
episodes.title: What in the F**k Happened to Our Trailer Park?

episodes.synopsis: Julian and Ricky have to make sure that Jim Lahey wins the election for trailer park supervisor over their archrival Sam Losco, who is also running.
episodes.title: Jim Lahey Is a Drunk Bastard

episodes.synopsis: Needing extra cash to expand their dope operation without raising Lahey's suspicions, Julian and Ricky open a disco bar in J-Roc's trailer.
episodes.title: I've Met Cats and Dogs Smarter than Trevor and Cory

episodes.synopsis: When their dope plants become infested with insects, Ricky and Julian quarantine the surviving crop in Bubbles's shed, leading to a fiery conclusion.
episodes.title: A Dope Trailer Is No Place for a Kitty

episodes.synopsis: A couple pretending to be a preacher and his daughter selling Bibles comes to the park, hoping to make off with lots of cash.
episodes.title: The Bible Pimp

episodes.synopsis: Randy joins Julian and Ricky in their life of crime. However, when Randy is caught spying on them, it puts their dope operation in danger.
episodes.title: Never Trust a Man with No Shirt On

episodes.synopsis: Julian asks J-Roc to make another porno film to make Barb dump Sam, Ricky gets his Grade 10, and Julian successfully sells the hash.
episodes.title: The Bare Pimp Project

episodes.synopsis: After their release from prison, Ricky and Julian are free and rich, thanks to their huge dope sale to the prison guards and inmates.
episodes.title: The Kiss of Freedom

episodes.synopsis: Ricky wins the new position of temporary relief assistant trailer park supervisor after Randy is suspended by Barb Lahey.
episodes.title: Temporary Relief Assistant Trailer Park Supervisor

episodes.synopsis: Julian reveals a new plan to the boys that involves committing various small crimes so they can't go to jail, and saving the money for a cruise trip.
episodes.title: If I Can't Smoke and Swear I'm F**ked

episodes.synopsis: The boys decide to put on a rap concert in celebration of J-Roc's new CD. Things take a turn for the worse when J-Roc is caught masturbating.
episodes.title: Who's the Microphone Assassin?

episodes.synopsis: When ripped off on buying Rush tickets by Lahey and Randy, Ricky "borrows" guitarist Alex Lifeson for tickets. Lifeson's hotel room number is 2112.
episodes.title: Closer to the Heart

episodes.synopsis: Ricky conspires to get rich by using kids to help him steal barbecues, as minors are protected under the Youth Justice Act.
episodes.title: Where in the F**k Is Randy's Barbeque?

episodes.synopsis: It's the anniversary of Mr. Lahey's being fired from the police force.
episodes.title: The Delusions of Officer Jim Lahey

episodes.synopsis: Upon realizing that he has no ticket for the eagerly awaited cruise and being evicted from the trailer park, Ricky is determined to go back to jail.
episodes.title: A Sh*t Leopard Can't Change Its Spots

episodes.synopsis: After eight months behind bars, Julian, Mr. Lahey and Randy are released, only to discover that Ricky is the new supervisor of Sunnyvale Trailer Park.
episodes.title: Never Cry Sh*twolf

episodes.synopsis: Broke and tired of Ricky's illegal plans, Julian decides to leave the trailer park to live in his car. Meanwhile, Randy resorts to prostitution.
episodes.title: A Man's Gotta Eat

episodes.synopsis: Ricky and Bubbles mistake Julian for a "Samsquantch" and beat up each other with baseball bats. They also open a massage parlor in the park.
episodes.title: Rub 'N Tiz'zug

episodes.synopsis: When Ricky plans to have a community day in the park complete with wrestling, Bubbles assumes the identity of a wrestler from "parts unknown."
episodes.title: The Green Bastard

episodes.synopsis: When Bubbles has a toothache, he tries everything to get rid of it. Julian tells him that he must go to the hospital.
episodes.title: Conky

episodes.synopsis: Ricky, Julian and Bubbles find a mountain lion in their marijuana field eating their weed. Things get complicated when Bubbles befriends the animal.
episodes.title: If You Love Something Set It Free

episodes.synopsis: The boys plan to smuggle the dope and sell it at a Snoop Dogg concert. Lahey asks Barb to marry him again, but Barb declines.
episodes.title: Propane, Propane

episodes.synopsis: The boys hold Rita MacNeil and her entourage hostage and force them to help harvest the dope crop. A hostile standoff ensues.
episodes.title: Working Man

episodes.synopsis: After a brief stint in jail, Ricky, Julian and Bubbles return to the trailer park in style, but soon discover that Trevor and Corey lost their money.
episodes.title: Give Peace a Chance

episodes.synopsis: Cory and Trevor go to work for Julian and help him steal hash from Cyrus, Terry and Dennis, then concoct a plan to hide it until they find a buyer.
episodes.title: The Sh*t Puppets

episodes.synopsis: Ricky, Julian and Bubbles hide their hash under Ray's driveway. Ray's addictions worsen. Ricky barbecues for his family, with devastating results.
episodes.title: The F**kin Way She Goes

episodes.synopsis: Ricky, Julian and Bubbles help Ray find a new home after his trailer burns down in a fire that Ricky caused. However, it's Bubbles who gets the blame.
episodes.title: You Got to Blame the Thing Up Here

episodes.synopsis: Bubbles pretends to be a spaceman when the boys steal a rocket set. Ray reveals Lahey's secret, and Lahey goes off the deep end.
episodes.title: Jim Lahey Is a F**kin' Drunk and He Always Will Be

episodes.synopsis: Ray and Bubbles star in another of J-Roc's adult films, but Lahey and Randy confiscate J-Roc's tape, which has evidence of Ray's disability fraud.
episodes.title: Don't Cross the Sh*t Line

episodes.synopsis: Ricky tries to go back to school but ends up working as a janitor selling dope to the students. Lahey has disturbing visions of the future.
episodes.title: The Winds of Sh*t

episodes.synopsis: Julian's biggest moneymaking scheme involves smuggling the hash using the shopping carts at a local mall. Trinity gets charged with underage driving.
episodes.title: Dressed All Over & Zesty Mordant

episodes.synopsis: Ricky bails Trinity out of jail. Lahey goes on a bender and tricks Cory and Trevor into giving him information. Julian tries to get his trailer back.
episodes.title: I Am the Liquor

episodes.synopsis: Cyrus and his gang are bailed out of jail by Randy and immediately go after Ricky, Julian and Bubbles for getting them busted and taking their hash.
episodes.title: Sh*t Blizzard

episodes.synopsis: Ray gets booted out of Sunnyvale, Julian sells booze in jail, Randy gets fed up with Lahey's drinking, and Bubbles opens a daycare for cats.
episodes.title: Way of the Road

episodes.synopsis: While Randy organizes a trailer park-wide cheeseburger picnic, Lahey pretends to be drunk in hopes of catching the boys breaking the law.
episodes.title: The Cheeseburger Picnic

episodes.synopsis: When a local TV station comes to Sunnyvale, Cory and Trevor try to publicize their business, and Bubbles promotes his Kittyland Love Center.
episodes.title: High Definition Piss Jugs

episodes.synopsis: Bubbles's kitty daycare gets some actual customers, and Ricky and Julian must track down Trinity's lost chicken to keep her from failing sixth grade.
episodes.title: Where in the F**k Is Oscar Goldman?

episodes.synopsis: Randy goes nuts with his eviction policy, and Lahey uncovers evidence that the boys were behind the prank that got him fired from the police force.
episodes.title: Halloween 1977

episodes.synopsis: Blaming Randy for getting him fired, Sam Losco takes him captive and holds him for ransom. Meanwhile, Bubbles helps Lahey get back his badge.
episodes.title: Gimme My F**king Money or Randy's Dead

episodes.synopsis: Ricky and Bubbles try to profit by selling stolen meat from a grocery store. Meanwhile, Lucy is pregnant and more demanding to Ricky.
episodes.title: I F**kin' Miss Cory & Trevor

episodes.synopsis: J-Roc organizes a gang to steal bags at the airport. We learn more about Lucy's pregnancy and that Ricky is not actually the father of Lucy's child.
episodes.title: I Banged Lucy and Knocked Her Up, No Big Deal

episodes.synopsis: Officers George Green and Ted Johnston attempt to kill Lahey, Randy and Phil Collins for not filing search warrants against Julian and J-Roc.
episodes.title: Three Good Men Are Dead

episodes.synopsis: At a model train convention hosted by Sebastian Bach, Ray gets busted for soliciting an undercover cop, leaving Bubbles stranded in a phone booth.
episodes.title: Friends of the Road

episodes.synopsis: Julian comes up with a plan to smuggle dope into Maine by using Patrick Swayze's model train that Bubbles stole.
episodes.title: The Mustard Tiger

episodes.synopsis: The boys head to the woods in search of Jacob and his friends and soon come across Julian's 1987 Monte Carlo in the river.
episodes.title: We Can't Call People Without Wings Angels, So We Call Them Friends

episodes.synopsis: Randy and Phil Collins are busy with final preparations before the opening of The Dirty Burger, including a bicycle stunt by Randy that goes wrong.
episodes.title: Jump the Cheeseburger

episodes.synopsis: Randy and Lahey get back together with the help of alcohol. Randy tries to break off his engagement with Lucy. Bubbles is having problems.
episodes.title: Let the Liquor Do the Thinking

episodes.synopsis: The Boys proceed with their cross-border shipment plan with Sebastian Bach. But can they trust their crew?
episodes.title: Going Off the Rails on the Swayzie Train

episodes.synopsis: This episode revolves around the conclusion of the boys' plan to smuggle dope to the United States. As usual, the plan doesn't go quite to plan.
episodes.title: A Sh*t River Runs Through It

episodes.synopsis: The boys each have new moneymaking schemes, Jim Lahey is on the verge of retiring and Randy has a new assistant.
episodes.title: Money Can Suck My C**k

episodes.synopsis: Julian offers to partner with Barb so that she can keep the trailer park, but they need Jim Lahey's cooperation over his deciding one percent share.
episodes.title: The F**kin' V-Team

episodes.synopsis: Julian enlists J-Roc and Sarah's aid to turn his bar into a strip club. Ricky is not pleased when he finds out that his daughter Trinity is pregnant.
episodes.title: The Dirty Dancer

episodes.synopsis: When Orangie, Ricky's goldfish, dies after being given too many shooters, Julian and Bubbles try to replace it with another before Ricky finds out.
episodes.title: Orangie's Pretty F**kin' Tough

episodes.synopsis: TV celebrity Steve Rogers rents Julian's bar for his stag party, which gets of out hand and overflows into Bubbles's Shed-and-Breakfast sheds.
episodes.title: Whore-A-Geddon

episodes.synopsis: Bubbles's attempts to clear up a crab infestation in his sheds and on his kitties cause him embarrassment, and he's arrested for indecent exposure.
episodes.title: Friends with the Benedicts

episodes.synopsis: Sentenced to community service, Bubbles insists that Julian and Ricky help him with a school puppet show. The Green Bastard teaches Ricky a lesson.
episodes.title: Community Service and a Boner Made with Love

episodes.synopsis: When the compressor air conditioner breaks, Bubbles has to turn his sheds into an industrial honey oil manufacturing complex to save Ricky's weed.
episodes.title: The Super-Duper-Industrial-Bubbles-Honey-Oil-Inator

episodes.synopsis: While being filmed by George Green, Bubbles gets his oil production going, aiming to make enough money to buy the trailer park for Barb and Julian.
episodes.title: Righties Loosies, Lefties Tighties

episodes.synopsis: The boys sell their entire honey oil output to Sebastian Bach, but to seal the deal for the trailer park, Julian has to do something truly terrible.
episodes.title: Crawling Through the Sh*tpipe

episodes.synopsis: Julian and Ricky get out of jail and return to the Sunnyvale Trailer Park, but when they arrive, they find that nothing is as they left it.
episodes.title: Why in the F**k Is My Trailer Pink?

episodes.synopsis: Ricky tries to keep his family together despite not being allowed back in the park, while Julian and Bubbles try to get business going again.
episodes.title: A Stable F**king Environment

episodes.synopsis: Julian hatches a plan to secure a place to live while Ricky and his family struggle with their new life in the barn.
episodes.title: Anointed In Liquor

episodes.synopsis: Julian and his crew have a motel auction while Ricky must track down a list full of baby items to keep his family together.
episodes.title: George Green: Industrial C**k Inhaler

episodes.synopsis: Ricky brings his grandson home to the motel, but it doesn't go as planned, and Julian implements the first stage in his bid to get Sunnyvale back.
episodes.title: The Motel Can't Live at the Motel

episodes.synopsis: J-Roc struggles with his new role as a father, and Julian's plan to get the park back earns Ricky a piece of Leslie's wrath.
episodes.title: Sweet Liquory Load

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Lahey falls off the wagon on the day of Sunnyvale's big appraisal, which Julian, Ricky and the crew do their best to ruin.
episodes.title: Piss

episodes.synopsis: Leslie puts Sunnyvale Park under lock-down, Ricky holds an open house at the motel, and Ricky also has an adventure in the woods.
episodes.title: A Dancer for Money

episodes.synopsis: Julian gets desperate in his attempt to reclaim Sunnyvale, Ricky finally might get his family back, and Mr. Lahey falls further off the wagon.
episodes.title: Sam-Squamptches and Heli-C**ksuckers

episodes.synopsis: It's morning in Sunnyvale as Julian carries out the final stage of his big reverse psychology plan to get his beloved trailer park back.
episodes.title: The Liquor Snurf

episodes.synopsis: While Julian celebrates the bar's success and Ricky and Lucy try for a baby, a familiar face returns from jail to shake things up at the park.
episodes.title: Freedom 45?

episodes.synopsis: Desperate for quick cash to fight the court case, the boys try to collect outstanding lot fees at the park and consider a return to petty crime.
episodes.title: You Want the Lot Fees, Suck Them Out of the Tip of My C**k

episodes.synopsis: As Barb and her sidekicks try to strong-arm Lahey and Randy into testifying for her in court, the boys set out to case a fancy neighborhood.
episodes.title: A Three Tiered Sh*t Dyke

episodes.synopsis: After handing over Trinity's wedding money, Ricky swears off crime, but Julian tries to talk him into one last job at the Denture King offices.
episodes.title: Sh*t Covered Cave Teeth

episodes.synopsis: When a truck heist goes awry, the boys turn to Sam the Denture King for help. But a fight at his office quickly spirals out of control.
episodes.title: If You Don't Believe It, It's Not Real

episodes.synopsis: When Julian turns his bar into an all-inclusive casino, the ad made by Bubbles and Ricky stirs up trouble and gets a celebrity's attention.
episodes.title: All the F**kin' Dope You Can Smoke!

episodes.synopsis: A visit from Snoop Dogg and friends sets the trailer park abuzz, and Sunnyvale fan Tom Arnold fulfills a bucket-list dream with Bubbles.
episodes.title: Up In Smoke We Go

episodes.synopsis: Bubbles battles a bad case of nerves at his open mic gig, and Lucy weighs a startling offer from Tom Arnold.
episodes.title: The Super Bling Cowboy

episodes.synopsis: Tom sets out on an adventure with Lucy, while Snoop tries Ricky's new concoction and Lahey plots a diabolical mission.
episodes.title: Thugged Out Gangsta Sh*t

episodes.synopsis: Still shaken up, the gang gets ready for Trinity and Jacob's wedding. Meanwhile, Barb struggles with a big decision about the park.
episodes.title: Looks Like the Liquor Wins
